DataCommand.Name: Launchpad.FetchBasicProfileData
DataCommand.CommandText: SELECT Individual.[First_Name] as FirstName, Individual.[Last_Name] as LastName FROM [ChmPeople].[dbo].[Individual] as Individual WITH(NOLOCK) JOIN [ChmPeople].[dbo].[UserLogin] as Userlogin WITH(NOLOCK) ON Userlogin.IndividualId = Individual.Individual_Id WHERE Userlogin.[ChurchId] = @ChurchId AND Userlogin.[Email] = @LoginEmail
